div.p:
Curia Balliuorum burgj de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die mensis Octobris
Anno Dominj Millesimo quingentesimo nono

Eodem die Alisona meldrum sponsa Johannis Arthour amerciatur in defectu presencie
quia legittime premonita fuit Ad comparendum ad Respondendum pro perturbio Johannis collison'
Et elizabeth leslie sponsa sue

The said' day the prouost ande baillies chargit the four officiaris quhar
euir thai cuth comprehend Alisone meldrum the spous' of Johnne Arthour to tak
sikkir souerte of hir to entir befor thame one monunday that next cumis thair
tile ansuer for the strublancis of John Colisone ande Elizabeth leslie his
spous' Ande give scho wil nocht find' souerte til Include hir persone in the
tolbuth one to the tyme scho fynd' soverte

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quinto die nouembris
anno quo supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit friday that next Cumis to thomas
straloche to preiwe his pament of xl s' aucht to Robert crag

The saide day the balyeis chargit and ordanit William scrimgeour sergeand to pas' and
warne elizibeth leslie the relict of Dauid blinsele to comper befor thame
one friday that next cumis tile ansuer tile Niniane blinsele anent

The said' day Alexander menyeis one that ane part and Johne arthour one that
vthir part was bundin oblist and suorn the grettht aithe tile stand abide
and vndirlie the Sentence ande deliuerance of thir personis eftir writin
chosin and Suorne be consent and assent of batht the said partiis anent
the tribulance debatabile betuix thame one athir' partj that is to say
Alexander bannerman of Wattirtoune Johne leslie of Warderis James colisone
Johne ruthirfurde knicht Johne Cullane ser Androw fyf quhilkis personis
was suorne the gret aithe to determe In the saide mater and tak It vpon'
thame Ande examnit part of witnes tharintile Ande thareftir continevit this
matir tro settirday that next Cumis quhile thai gat mair' verificacioun' the samyn
Ande forthir Induring thar willis and gif thai cane nocht ag
gre to cheis' ane odman to thame sex personis

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem ixo die mensis nouembris
Anno quo Supra

The saide day It was Sufficientlie preuit that thomas straloche is avand'
to Robert crag xl s' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme
of law

The said' day It was statut and' ordanit be the prouost bailyeis ande
Counsel present for the tyme that Candilmakkaris of the town' sal mak
Candil smal wekit dry the pund' for thre penneis reddy til sel tile ale
men vndir the pane of viij s' vnforgevin And' breking of the commoune
ordinancis

The said' day the prouost ande bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to
Williame Rolland' tile ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be Alexander
Cumin of Cultir for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ane' brew
Caldrovn' extending tile xviij gallovnis or thairby price fifty fif schillingis
to gud estimacioun'

The said' day Richerd' litster was in ane' amerciament of the Cowrt in
defalt of presencis as he that vas lauchfully varnit and nocht Comperit

Eodem die Willelmus gray fecit constituit et Creauit Willelmum Rolland' suum
legittimum procuratorem actorem et factorem Ad prosequendum richardj litster in vico
furcarum pro quatuor vlnis pannj magistri Agendum defendendum et cetera Promittens
de Rato et grato Cum ceteris clausulis necessarijs et oportunis

The said' day Patry reid' lauchfully warnit callit and nocht comperit
tile ansuer to the borgh fundin one him be John Kennerty for the withhalding
fra him of half ane' barrel of girls' et cetera Thairfor the bailyeis chargit
William scrimgeour sergeand' to tak ane' stres' of the said' patry and lat It
to borgh give It be askit and warne the said' patry to this day xv
dais as secund' day of proces'

The said' day Williame Wormet lamentabily complenit to the prouost and
bailyeis that Robert athail in Kinkorth haid wranguisly tribulit him sayand'
oppinly in the comone mercat gait of Abirdene that he had passit
our the wattir to Torre with ane tua handit suerd' ande slew ane Woman
at the Cowrt of Torre Ande' thaireftir the bailyeis accusit the said' Robert for the
said' tribulancis quhilk he denyit ande thareftir the said' Actioun' vas put
to the decisioune of thir personis vndirwritin with consent of bath the said' parteis
that Is to say James malisone Williame rolland' Dauid fynne Johnne moyr
Johnne Kintor Duncane fif Androw brabner Duncane Craik and' Alexander
burnet burges of the said' burgh' chosine one ane' assis' Quhilkis
riplie auisit the greit aith suorne the rychtis ressonis and' allegacionis
rychtis witnes and' prefis of bath the said' parteis hard' sene considerit and
vndirstand' ffand and deliuerit be the moutht of the said' James colisone
forspekar of the said' assis' al in ane woce concordand' that thai culd'
nocht acquyt the said' Robert of the tribulancis of the said Williame
sayand' the said' Iniurious' langage as he vas accusit ffor the quhilk
he vas in ane' amerciament of the Cowrt tile amend' as law wile and forbeir
in tyme to cum and that vas givin for dome be the moutht of William fynne
dempstar of the Court And' the said' William Wormet was maid'
quyt of al tribulancis of the said' Robert be the said assis'

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimosexto
die mensis Noumbris Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo Nono

The said day the masteris of the fischear baittis of futy that is to say
was conuikitt' be ane suone assis' thomas Wod forpsekar for the selling'
of fische at the schoir to landmen or thai be present to the markat And
for selling of fische to landmen' or the towne be seruit thai beand present
to the merkat And for selling of fische in gret to particular personis
in gret or the commondis be seruit in small And for regrating and'
selling of fische be hundrethtis to thar avin seruandis and baittismennis
wiffis and vthir personis quhilkis thai sell agane in smale to gret preiudice
of the commondis ffor the quhilkis ilkane of thame was in sindrie amercia
mentis of the court as is befor writin and aucht till amend as law
will and forber in tyme tocum et cetera

The said day the borgh' fudnin be Johnne arthour one Johnne Colisone
that he wranguisly and aganis the law withheld' fra him xxxiiij s' for sex
bollis of salt and aucht till haue pait him the said money or ellis
salmond siclik as the said Johnne arthour allgeit he pait to the fraucht
man' fra quhome the said salt was boucht was fundin of nane
awaile be ane suorne assis' thomas Wod forspekar becaus It was
fundin be thame that the said Johnne colison' suld' pay to the said Johne
arthour thridpart siluer thridpart hiddis and thridpart salmond to
respondand' to the said Sowme siclik as vthiris merchand men' did
that had apart of the said salt ffor the quhilkis borgh' strekin wrang
uisly the said Johnne arthour was in amerciament of the court And
the said Johnne colisone chargit to pay the said Johnne eftir the deliuerance
of the assis' within terme of law

div.head: Assisa
div.p:
Thomas Waus Androue fif thomas Wod mathou branche george bisset
Dauid mar Johnne Kintor alexander malisone' Wilyeame Abirdour
Androu litster Johnne andersone gawane of murray Johnne craik
gilbert litstar Johnne malisone alexander nory Alexander blinseile Androw
low and Androu burnat

The said day the borgh' fundin be Dauid grig one James colisone'
in the handis of Wilyeame' scrimgeour ane of the officiaris of the said
burgh' Of the quhilk the tenour eftir follouis I Dauid grige burges
of Aberdene findis ane borgh' in youre handis Wilyeame scrimgeour
officiar' of this burgh' vppoun' James Colisone / that quhar the said
James colisone Dauid ruthirfurd Johnne crag and I bought xxvij moy
of salt in Deip fra Johnne Dows' to be deliuerit in Aberdene as the
chartir party tharapon' proportis And now the said James colisone wald
wranguisly put me fra my part tharof I beand bundin in the chartir
partie ane of the foure and us reddy my fadir my frendis and my self to
do tharto according to ressone and aw to haue my part And that the said
James wrangis to defraud me or put me fra my part tharo and tharto my
borght and a borgh' to follou my borght was fundin of nane awaile
be the assis' abuf writin thomas Waus forspekar of the samyn as
it was strekit quhilkis fand that the said James had done na
wrang to the said Dauid as yeit becaus of the strekin of the said
borgh' vnourdourlie ffor the quhilkis the said Dauid was in amerciament
of the court And atour the said assis' ordanit that na salt be deliuerit
furtht of the schip vnto the tyme the chartir party be schavin quhat
salt the said Dauid grig suld' haue And quhat beis contenit in
the said chartir party the said Dauid grig to haue his part tharof

Eodem die Johannes ruthirfurd miles deuenit plegius legalis per manus
sue dextre ostensionem quod Johannes Colisoune erit Indempnes pro Johanne
Cullane aliter per quam viam juris Et Duncanus Colisone deuenit
plegius legalis per manus sue dextre ostensionem quod prefatus Johannes
Cullane erit Indempnis pro dicto Jacobo Colisone aliter per quam viam
Juris Et vtraque pars obligauit se fidemedia ad conseruandum dictos suos
plegios de huismodi fideiussione per manuum suarum ostendem

Eodem die Alisona meldrum cum consensu et assensu Johannis arthoure
sponsi suj fecit constituit creauit et ordinauit Duncanum fif suum legittimum
procuratorem actorem et factorem et cetera dans et concedens eidem Duncano
suam legittimam potestatem ac mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo ad
respondendum Johannj colisone et Elizibeth leslie sponse sue in actionibus perturbij
et cetera contra eam obitiendis agendum defendum prosequendum Promittens
se de rato et grato et cetera cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis et cetera

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo nono
die mensis Nouembris Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo nono

The said day Bessy Dyngwaile grantit hir awand' to margaret Kintor
the spous of alexander malisone xxxj s' et vj d' quhilkis the bailyeis chargit
him to pay within terme of lawe

The saide day Johnne arthoure offerit him reddy tile vnderly the decisioun'
of ane assis' and tile admitt ony Jug in ale thingis that the bailye Johne
colisoun' has to say to him

The said day Johnne' Colsione bailye allegijt that the thingis that he has to say
or persew Johnne arthoure his actioun' of cryme and pertenis to the Justice ayr'
for the quhilkis he wald' nocht persew the said Johnne in this court

The said day the prouost and bailyeis ordanit Elizibeth Setoun' one that ane
part and Dauid fynne one that vthir to deliuire all thar writtis and richtis quhilkis
thai haue and will wse anent ane half nethis fischeing of the pott pertenis betuix thaim
debatabile' and assignit friday that nixt cummys to thame for ane small decret
to be gevin tharapone

The said day the bailyeis ordanit Wilyeame scrimgeour officiar to deliuer
Dauid treis tua elne of quhit lynyng clath and xiij d' of siluer for tua elne
of wuhit clath quhilk he borrowit at the merkat cors

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo sexto
die mensis Nouembris Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo nono

The said day the bailyeis warnit thomas menyeis personalie apprehendit to
Comper' on friday that nixt cummys to ansuer at the Isntance of Johnne arthour
for the tribulance allegeit bon' to him be the said thomas

The said day the bailyeis chargit Duncan arthour and Johnne tailyeour to remain
within the tolbutht quhill thai content and pay xviij s' to charlis stevinson'
for ane cobill quhilk was apprisit to the said Sovme lattin away in thar
defalt

The said day the bailyeis chargit Androw nachtie to Remain within the tolbutht
becaus thai gef him command to warne trolly quhilk he comprehendit and
wald' ger for strublance done to Willyeam forsy

The said day Johnne Kennerty lauchfully warne be Androw naughtie officiar'
and nocht comperit tile haue ansuerit for the triblance done to paule in amerciament
of the court in defalt of presens

The said day the bailyeis assignit betuix this and the morne eftir the concepcion'
of our lady to cuthbert Jhonstone one that ane part and alexander cuming of culter procuratour
for Niniane blinseile one that vthir part to caus thre personis euiry ane of
thame to be suorne tile consider the faltis of the landis pertening to the said Ninian'
blinseile quhilkis Elizibeth lesly spous to the said cuthberd has in coniunctfeftment
And' the partj comperand' sal haue pouer to cheis' ale the sex personis gif sa beis
that the tothir partj comper nocht

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene xxviii die mensis nouembris
anno quo supra

The said' day marione blak wif of Androw vmfray deponit be
hir' conscience and lautay that Androw Walcar hade done nay
skath to hir quhit clath quhilk he hede in wirkin

Eodem die Alexander Wallace conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex orre thome
Waus prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Alanj philp et cetera Et Idem alanus
conuictus fuit pro leue perturbio ipsius alexandri et quilibet alteri emendabit
ut Jura volunt

head.add: margaret smyth for brekin of ane Rest

div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo die Decembris
anno quo Supra

The said' day the balyeis' ordanit Jonhne malisone to pay tile Androw litstar
xxij s' for ane barrele of tar or ellis preiwe him pait one monunday
that next Cumis

The said' day Jonet Kintor and hir' seruand' was fundin quyt of the Rding of alexander
grais meir' be ane Suorne assis' Duncane Colisone forspekar and the saide Alexander
gray was conuict' be the saide assis' for tribulance of the saide Jonet for the quhilk
he was in Amerciament of the court and tile Amend' as law and forbeir' in tyme to cum

Curia Baliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem duodecimo die
mensis Decembris anno quo supra

The said day Alexander Irvin of Drum knycht come Souerte to the Prouost
and bailyeis tile entir alexander Irvin his brodir befor thame one fiftene
dais warnyng or soner he beand' warnyt personalie tharto tile ansuer
at the Instance of gilbert Jhounstoun'

The said It was fundin be ane suorne assis' patrik reid forspekar that Johnne'
Colisone sal pay to Johnne arthour ix s' iiij d' quhilkis the bailyeis chargit
him to pay within terme of law

The said day Wilyeame portar and Androw stratoun' come dettouris tile pay to androw
turing fourten' schillingis betuix this and fastirnisevin for ane ox quhilk androw
Walcar had pertening to the said androw turing and' the said androw Walcar oblist
him be the faitht of his bodie to freitht and releif the said Wilyeam portar
and Androw Walcar sal sit dovne one his kneis and ask the said androw
turing forgevnis one his kneis for the displesance done to him quhilk he did'
in the court

The said day the bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cummys tile georg bisset Johnne
andersoun' and androw litstar tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin one thame be Johnne
malisone for the wranguis' withhalding fra him of the key of ane loft dur and
setting of the said loft at thar avin handis without his licence sen' the fest of
michelmes last bipast

The said day the bailyeis chargit Wilyeame scrogis to pay to Johnne Iruyn'
ane couering of quhit fusteane new and sex schillingis of siluer within terme
of law becaus' it was sufficientlie preuit be certane leill personis that he was
avin him the said fusteane and money And als chargit the said Johnne Irvin
to pay within the said terme vj pekis of malt to the said Wilyeame'

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem duodecimo die
mensis Decembris Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo nono

The said day the Prouest and bailyeis chargit all the marchandis awing
fraucht to Johnne grauaile franchman to pay him within terme of law
And' atour the said Johnne gravaile protestit that gif the said marchandis
pait him nocht his said fraucht within terme of law that and' he ly
tharour in thar defalt suld' ly one thar expens'

The said day James Colisone Dauid ruthirfurd and Johnne Crag grantit
that Johnne Dous' francheman lyin dais war gane And offerit grantit
thame to lay In gudes apone his schip bodum to pay thar salt and waist
frauche And' atour thai protestit quhat skaitht that happinnit tocum
suld' turne apone thame that wald' nocht pay thar frauchte and nocht apoun'
thame

The said day Dauid Andersoun' one that ane part and Johnne grauaill
franchman one that vthir' part band' thame to stand and abid' at the deliuerance
of James Colisone anent tua frankis clamyt be the said Dauid
andersoun' apone the said Johnne grauaile

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo
quarto die mensis Decembris Anno quosupra

The said day Johnne growele franchman one that ane part and alexander buk one
that vthir oblist thame be thar handis vphaldin to stand' and abid' at the
deliuerance of William Abirdour and Johnne reid' anent xl s' for certane frankis
franche money

The said day alexander gray grantit him awand' tile Alexander Tulidef
xxij schillingis quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The said Robert Joffray grantit him awand' tile Androw Durty tailyeour
xxvj schillingis quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The said day the borghe fundin one Johanne andirsone george bisset and
Androw litster be John malisone for the wrnaguis' withhaldin fra him of ane key of ane
loft and for the setting of the samyn without his consent was fundin of nain
awaile be ane suorne assis' ser Johnne ruthirfurd forspekar ffor
the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court for the wranguis'
strikin of the said borgh' and thai quyt of his chalang

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' ser Johnne ruthirfurd forspekar
that richerd' litstar sall deliuer ane schryne quhilk he has to the relict' of vmquhile
Johnne litstar And gif he has ony thing to say to the said relict' persew hir as law
will

add.foreign: Diuisio terre inter Jonetam rolland' et margaretam rolland'

div.p:
The said day thir personis Johnne lesly of Warderis ser Johnne ruthirfurde
knicht Androu Cullane alexander gray Dauid andersone Duncan colisone Androw
fif robert crag Wilyeame futhes Duncan fif richerd Waus Johnne moire
and Wilyeame Abirdoure chosin and suorne the greith aitht at command' of the
Prouost and bailyeis be wertew of ane breif of diuisioun' of oure
Souerane lordis chapell with consent and assent of Jonet rolland one that
ane part and Richard' coyne procuratour for margaret rolland' his spous' one
that vthir part porcionis of ane tenement Inland' and forland' liand within
the said burght in the vuirkirkgait one the northt part of the samyn betuix
the land' of vmquhile Johnne Duncansone one the est part and the land of
robert crag one the west part the kingis gait one the southt and the common
wenel passing to the loche one the northt part to diuid' and part
and part the said tenement et cetera Diuidit in this maner folloving'
in tua partis that is to say the haile Inland' witht ale asiamentis aucht
and wont and half the yard with free Ischey and Entray with foryet
and bakyeit except the threwrtyr' hous' for the half of the said tennement
And' the haile forland' threwrtour hous' and half the yard with fre Ischey
and entiray of foryeit and bakyeit for the tothir half of the said lande And
the pentys' betuix the forland' and the said Inland' to be equalie Josit
and breukit betuix the said landis for the secreit asiament of the saide
landis And' the said Jonet eldast Sister chesit and ressauit the saide
Inland' and half the yard for his part of the said tennement And the saide
Richerd' procuratoure for his said spous chesit and ressauit the hale forland
and the said threwrtyr' hous' with the half of the said yard for the part of
the said' tennment pertenyng to his said spous' vppoun' the quhilkis baitht the partijs askit Instrument of me
ser Johnne stirueling notar publik Befor thir witnes gilbert menyeis
Prouost Johnne colisone patry lesly alexander menyeis thre of the balyeis
of the said burgh' Johnne Arthour Johnne andersone georg' bisset
Androw litstar ser Dauy liell and master Alexander portar with vthir
Diuers'
